characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a red car, driver of a white truck
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a multi-lane road. A white truck is on the left side, a red car is in the adjacent lane, and a black sedan is ahead. The red car moves from the adjacent lane into the self-driving vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the black sedan ahead. The vehicle adjusts its position slightly to the right to avoid the white truck on the left.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white truck, approximately 2 meters away, maintaining its lane. 2) Right side: A red car, approximately 3 meters away, moving into the self-driving vehicles lane. 3) Front: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining its lane.
